body:
Its come to the staff's attention that we need a new hub soon. At Ivy's request, the Map Development team will be making a new hub that is more satisfying and overall, more fun. They need some help though because they don't exactly know what you all want. Please leave a list of the things that you want to be added to the new hub. 
Thank you,
Max
body_tagged:

They need some help though because they don't exactly know what you all want. Please leave a list of the things that you want to be added to the new hub. 
Thank you,
Max

replies.body:
To be quite blunt. Why the heck would we start a new hub when there's a multitude of glitches to fix in gamemodes? This just sets us back from fixing these things. We need to worry about long term gameplay issues before we work on aesthetics. It's like a map, it can be the nicest looking map ever, but if it has functionality issues like potholes everywhere stopping people from sprinting, no one will play the map. This is meant with all due respect, i'm trying to help the server not get everyone pissed off. We need to fix Elim compasses if they haven't been already, fix slowness instead of speed in the CTH scout kit, the double hit glitch, people glitched into the ground. The bug in Nebula where it makes you invis and on a neutral team where you appear grey on your screen but you appear to be on a team to everyone else and you can teamkill. I'm just saying address the issues before adding luxuries. 

I do like the idea though :3 

just after the issues are fixed
replies.body_tagged:

It's like a map, it can be the nicest looking map ever, but if it has functionality issues like potholes everywhere stopping people from sprinting, no one will play the map. This is meant with all due respect, i'm trying to help the server not get everyone pissed off. We need to fix Elim compasses if they haven't been already, fix slowness instead of speed in the CTH scout kit, the double hit glitch, people glitched into the ground. The bug in Nebula where it makes you invis and on a neutral team where you appear grey on your screen but you appear to be on a team to everyone else and you can teamkill. I'm just saying address the issues before adding luxuries. 

I do like the idea though :3 

just after the issues are fixed

replies.body: No, creating a hub does not matter much about a "contest". It matters if the hub is build properly, efficient and is fun to use for others and such. The hub matters on taking time, you cannot simply rush it as a contest or it would not be made at it's best work.
replies.body_tagged: No, creating a hub does not matter much about a "contest". It matters if the hub is build properly, efficient and is fun to use for others and such. The hub matters on taking time, you cannot simply rush it as a contest or it would not be made at it's best work.

replies.body:
Calm down, Ivy isn't personally working on this project. He is currently busy recoding most of the plugins and creating new game modes and what not. There is a lot planned in the next update, and we would like for a hub for all players. Please report all bugs onto the github, or send them to me over Skype: gilletteracer.
Complaining about glitches that the staff doesn't know about does nothing to help the issues.
replies.body_tagged:
Calm down, Ivy isn't personally working on this project. He is currently busy recoding most of the plugins and creating new game modes and what not. There is a lot planned in the next update, and we would like for a hub for all players. Please report all bugs onto the github, or send them to me over Skype: gilletteracer.
Complaining about glitches that the staff doesn't know about does nothing to help the issues.

replies.body:
Zintenka's list o' ideas:

Parkour:

This plz, and make special hardcore parkour challenges that when you complete, they give you +1000 XP in all games and +500 XP in wallet.

Holiday Auctions:

This can be implemented through having a global text and you doing /auction (XP). Every holidays, you can auction for a free rank (Gold and Diamond).

Gold starts at 100XP

Diamond starts at 200XP

Holidays active (Sorry if i miss some holidays, based on American holidays)

Mother's Day

Halloween

Thanksgiving

Christmas

Currency in the form of XP:

When you get XP, you can choose to either send it to the game currently played or send it to your "wallet". These could be commands /xpto game or /xpto wallet. You can choose to automatically send xp to either: /xpto auto game or wallet.

Lobby Trinkets:

You can use the XP money to get lobby trinkets. 

Jet pack: A trail of fire works trail behind you. 300XP

Bounce-a-Bouncing: High jump speed. 400XP

Tele-hax: Teleport to whatever block you point at and go through any block you choose. 500XP

S-kill-aura: Punch your fist and watch as you send lobby members flying across the map in an 8 block radius! 1500XP

Ranking systems:

Normal player: +10XP

Regular/Loyalist (At least 15 days of being online): +20XP

Gold: +25XP

Diamond: +30XP

Emerald: +35XP

MCZone Person (Were here in the times of the golden age for 1 and a half months...): +40XP

MCZone Veteran (Online in the golden age for more than 3 months): +50XP

If you have multiple ranks, they cannot add up or stack up so no funny business...

"How you like meh now!" -Zintenka, 2014

replies.body:
Like everyone else said, 
1. Parkour would be amazing, it's easy, simple and fun to create.
2. Many types of Parkour? Like an "Easy," "Medium," etc. 
3. Secret places to explore because those were definitely fun. 
4. Tutorials on gamemodes so that new-comers won't have to go into a Nebula game and ask. 
5. List of Basic Rules.
6. Simple and Small, not super big that it makes your computer lag. Small Hubs are what, I think, most new-comers enjoy. Be sure to still make it look pretty so it doesn't look too plain though. 
7. Staff Members. 
8. Erm, did I mention Secret Places? More of that please xD
replies.body_tagged:
Like everyone else said, 
1. Parkour would be amazing, it's easy, simple and fun to create.
2. Many types of Parkour? Like an "Easy," "Medium," etc. 
3. Secret places to explore because those were definitely fun. 
4. Tutorials on gamemodes so that new-comers won't have to go into a Nebula game and ask. 
5. List of Basic Rules.
6. Simple and Small, not super big that it makes your computer lag. Small Hubs are what, I think, most new-comers enjoy. Be sure to still make it look pretty so it doesn't look too plain though. 
7. Staff Members. 
8. Erm, did I mention Secret Places? More of that please xD

replies.body:
I would love the hub to have:
-Small minigames made with Avicus YAML.
-A wall of signs that explain the games, rules, and website.
-A small arena where people can 1v1 each other and people can watch.
-A place where people can build in creative mode and only the person who placed a block can remove it. Also, 5 minutes after a block is placed it will be removed.
-Carnival rides like roller coasters, farris wheels, and carousels.
-Parkour that awards you an emerald(The same emerald you get from voting.)
-Let some staff add small secrets :D.
Oh and please make pre made holiday hubs!

replies.body: If you're building a new hub, I suggest you look towards the hubs of Hypixel and Mineplex. There are clearly other popular servers with nice hubs, but those two really stand out to me. Perhaps a parkour with a specified start and end block... you could rig up a simple plugin to measure the time for players to reach the end, and then make an auto-updating leaderboard. That would be cool. Definitely add more gadgets to play with. Sure, the current hub looks nice, but it's pretty much just a big box with some signs on it, and really, who likes being in a bix box with some signs on it? Not me. A big box with some signs on it full of parkour and secrets, however, is someplace I would stay.
replies.body_tagged: If you're building a new hub, I suggest you look towards the hubs of Hypixel and Mineplex. There are clearly other popular servers with nice hubs, but those two really stand out to me. Perhaps a parkour with a specified start and end block... you could rig up a simple plugin to measure the time for players to reach the end, and then make an auto-updating leaderboard. That would be cool. Definitely add more gadgets to play with. Sure, the current hub looks nice, but it's pretty much just a big box with some signs on it, and really, who likes being in a bix box with some signs on it? Not me. A big box with some signs on it full of parkour and secrets, however, is someplace I would stay.

reply_to.body:
I presume that you should add parkour, "/fly,"/disguise," "/nick," command for donators who've donated for the server. 

/fly: Able to fly in hub
/disguise: Able to disguise (e.g., animals, people, etc..)
/nick: Able to nickname yourself
reply_to.body_tagged:

replies.body:
/fly: yes, as long as there are barriers so people cant fly out of spawn and into the distance.

/disguise: maybe only a couple mobs available (for example: everyone can disguise as, say, pig, gold can get pig and chicken, emerald can get pig, chicken, and cow, diamond gets pig, chicken, cow, and horse)

/nick: please, no. this will get abused so easily.

replies.body: also, this isnt necessarily a hub, but maybe a money system of sorts, like change the xp system to money and have an xp shop where you could buy lower level hub trails, disguises (see xInfantry's comment), and buy other hub perks like mounts and such. this is what makes the hubs in other minigame servers so fun and draws so many players... don't limit yourselves, either. i know there's already a new hub, but what draws a ton of players is uniqueness and creativity in the hubs, not just a generic hub with maybe a couple things to do in it.. i can't stress this enough tbh...
replies.body_tagged: also, this isnt necessarily a hub, but maybe a money system of sorts, like change the xp system to money and have an xp shop where you could buy lower level hub trails, disguises (see xInfantry's comment), and buy other hub perks like mounts and such. this is what makes the hubs in other minigame servers so fun and draws so many players... don't limit yourselves, either. i know there's already a new hub, but what draws a ton of players is uniqueness and creativity in the hubs, not just a generic hub with maybe a couple things to do in it.. i can't stress this enough tbh...
